bugs.title: CVE-2019-15142 djvulibre: heap-based buffer overflow in GStringRep::strdup in libdjvu/GString.cpp

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2019-15142 djvulibre: heap-based buffer overflow in GStringRep::strdup in libdjvu/GString.cpp

long_desc.thetext:
In DjVuLibre 3.5.27, DjVmDir.cpp in the DJVU reader component allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (application crash in GStringRep::strdup in libdjvu/GString.cpp caused by a heap-based buffer over-read) by crafting a DJVU file.

Reference:
https://sourceforge.net/p/djvu/bugs/296/

Upstream commit:
https://sourceforge.net/p/djvu/djvulibre-git/ci/970fb11a296b5bbdc5e8425851253d2c5913c45e/

bugs.title: CVE-2019-15143 djvulibre: infinite loop in GBitmap::read_rle_raw related to libdjvu/DjVmDir.cpp and libdjvu/GBitmap.cpp

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2019-15143 djvulibre: infinite loop in GBitmap::read_rle_raw related to libdjvu/DjVmDir.cpp and libdjvu/GBitmap.cpp

long_desc.thetext:
In DjVuLibre 3.5.27, the bitmap reader component allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service error (resource exhaustion caused by a GBitmap::read_rle_raw infinite loop) by crafting a corrupted image file, related to libdjvu/DjVmDir.cpp and libdjvu/GBitmap.cpp.

Reference:
https://sourceforge.net/p/djvu/bugs/297/

Upstream commit:
https://sourceforge.net/p/djvu/djvulibre-git/ci/b1f4e1b2187d9e5010cd01ceccf20b4a11ce723f/

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2019-15143 djvulibre: infinite loop in GBitmap::read_rle_raw related to libdjvu/DjVmDir.cpp and libdjvu/GBitmap.cpp [epel-6]

long_desc.thetext:
In DjVuLibre 3.5.27, the bitmap reader component allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service error (resource exhaustion caused by a GBitmap::read_rle_raw infinite loop) by crafting a corrupted image file, related to libdjvu/DjVmDir.cpp and libdjvu/GBitmap.cpp.

bugs.title: CVE-2019-15144 djvulibre: recursive call to GArrayTemplate<Run>::sort in GContainer.h leads to stack overflow

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2019-15144 djvulibre: recursive call to GArrayTemplate<Run>::sort in GContainer.h leads to stack overflow

long_desc.thetext:
In DjVuLibre 3.5.27, the sorting functionality (aka GArrayTemplate<TYPE>::sort) allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (application crash due to an Uncontrolled Recursion) by crafting a PBM image file that is mishandled in libdjvu/GContainer.h.

Reference:
https://sourceforge.net/p/djvu/bugs/299/

https://sourceforge.net/p/djvu/djvulibre-git/ci/e15d51510048927f172f1bf1f27ede65907d940d/

bugs.title: CVE-2019-15144 djvulibre: recursive call to GArrayTemplate<Run>::sort in GContainer.h leads to stack overflow [epel-7]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2019-15144 djvulibre: recursive call to GArrayTemplate<Run>::sort in GContainer.h leads to stack overflow [epel-7]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2019-15144 djvulibre: recursive call to GArrayTemplate<Run>::sort in GContainer.h leads to stack overflow

long_desc.thetext:
In DjVuLibre 3.5.27, the sorting functionality (aka GArrayTemplate<TYPE>::sort) allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (application crash due to an Uncontrolled Recursion) by crafting a PBM image file that is mishandled in libdjvu/GContainer.h.

Reference:
https://sourceforge.net/p/djvu/bugs/299/

Upstream commit:
https://sourceforge.net/p/djvu/djvulibre-git/ci/e15d51510048927f172f1bf1f27ede65907d940d/

bugs.title: CVE-2019-15145 djvulibre: out-of-bounds read in JB2Dict::JB2Codec::get_direct_context in libdjvu/JB2Image.h

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2019-15145 djvulibre: out-of-bounds read in JB2Dict::JB2Codec::get_direct_context in libdjvu/JB2Image.h

long_desc.thetext:
DjVuLibre 3.5.27 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service attack (application crash via an out-of-bounds read) by crafting a corrupted JB2 image file that is mishandled in JB2Dict::JB2Codec::get_direct_context in libdjvu/JB2Image.h because of a missing zero-bytes check in libdjvu/GBitmap.h.

Reference:
https://sourceforge.net/p/djvu/bugs/298/

Upstream commit:
https://sourceforge.net/p/djvu/djvulibre-git/ci/9658b01431cd7ff6344d7787f855179e73fe81a7/
